title: 600+ FortiGate Appliances Breached via AI-Assisted Campaign
summary: Amazon reported an attacker leveraged AI tooling to exploit FortiGate appliances at scale, compromising over 600 devices. AI is amplifying threat velocity beyond traditional patch cycles.

title: Mississippi Healthcare System Shuts Down Clinics After Ransomware
summary: A Mississippi healthcare system forced to close multiple clinics following ransomware. Healthcare remains #1 targeted vertical.

title: Supply Chain Attacks: Fake Next.js Repos, Rogue NuGet Packages
summary: Multiple supply chain campaigns: malicious Next.js job repos, rogue StripeApi NuGet package exfiltrating API keys, GitHub Codespaces flaw leaking Copilot tokens. Non-human identity compromise is exploding.

title: Reuters: CMMC Creating Barriers for Small DIB Suppliers
summary: Deep dive on CMMC compliance barriers for small defense suppliers. Months-long waits for Level 2 audits. Phase 2 mandatory third-party assessments begin Nov 10, 2026.

title: Rhode Island College Hosting CMMC Cybersecurity Summit
summary: RIC announced a CMMC-focused summit for defense contractors. Regional events signal growing demand for CMMC education and readiness services.

title: MSSP Alert: 2026 Blueprint — Platformization & NHI Explosion
summary: Non-human identities outnumber human identities 82:1 in enterprise. Winners will be MSSPs that consolidate platforms and deliver measurable outcomes.

title: MSPs Pivoting to MSSP Model as SMB Security Demands Grow
summary: MSPs pushed toward always-on MDR and identity-first security. Line between MSP and MSSP is dissolving.

title: Common Good Cyber Fund: $3.5M+ for Cybersecurity Nonprofits
summary: Internet Society Foundation launched Common Good Cyber Fund. ~15 two-year grants. Open call June 23 to August 4, 2026. Backed by Australia, Canada, Netherlands, UK governments.

title: Federal TIG Grant Program: 2026 Cycle Open
summary: CY2026 Technology Initiative Grant competitive funds posted. Pre-application deadline April 10, full application June 30, 2026.

title: Cisco SD-WAN Zero Day — CVE-2026-20127 (CVSS 10.0)
summary: Critical authentication bypass in Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Controller allows unauthenticated remote admin takeover. Actively exploited by UAT-8616 since 2023.

title: UFP Technologies Ransomware — Medical Device Supply Chain
summary: Medical device manufacturer hit with ransomware on Feb 14, data exfiltrated, filed with SEC.

title: Reuters: CMMC Creating Barriers for Small DIB Suppliers
summary: New CMMC self-assessment requirements straining small defense contractors. Level 2 audits expected by November 2026.

title: Active CMMC Contract Tracker — Growing Adoption
summary: Naval Sea Logistics Center and other agencies actively requiring CMMC compliance in new solicitations.

title: MSSP Industry Shifting to Outcome-Led Services
summary: MSSPs moving from tool stacking to scalable, outcome-driven delivery. 2026 MSSP Blueprint recommends autonomous, proactive security models.

title: SLCGP Extended + PILLAR Act — Federal Cyber Grant Funding
summary: Congress extended State and Local Cybersecurity Grant Program. Texas FY2026 postings live.

title: CYBERSPAN: AI-Driven Agentless Detection for MSSPs
summary: IntelliGenesis launched CYBERSPAN, agentless network detection for MSSP environments.

title: StateTech: 2026 Cyber Grant Priorities
summary: Priority areas: AI-driven cybersecurity transformation, autonomous defense, governance, workforce readiness.
